informalexample.para: To create a new characteristic for your current context, select the NEW button from the characteristics list. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new characteristic, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select a characteristic from the list of characteristics available for your current context. To learn more about how characteristics are linked to specific contexts, please see .
Enter a value to associate with the characteristic.

In some contexts, the default option will appear. Select if the value entered is the default value for the specified characteristic. Default values will always be listed first where characteristics are used.
